Description: Flight into Egypt; in centre, the Virgin seated on a donkey holding the infant Christ, with cherubim circling around them, and St Joseph to right in profile carrying a knapsack and leading the donkey towards left over rocks. c.1641 Etching
Producer name: Print made by: Stefano della Bella
Curator's comments: For the mounted impression of this print and comment, see 1871,0513.33
Acquisition notes: HS in Philipe's hand on the verso in oval blindstamp.
